channel.title: AllStar-scape v2
channel.description: I need help......................... I want to change the Words when you first log into allstar-scapev2 i changed everything in the client.java to my servers name but it still says that on the top... Yes i do know how to compile...............

item.title: AllStar-scape v2
item.dc:creator: @dragon39990 dragon39990
item.description:
@dragon39990 wrote:

[quote=“jose3121, post:2, topic:326532”]search sM(" with the welcome message example:
Welcome to fmlscape
Forums under construction

Search for sM("Welcome to fmlscape");
in client.java[/quote]

That guys doesn’t know anytthing…idoit… hes using allstar not delta… so its not “sM” its"sendMessage"

----And to answer your question …if you even still need it—
Files used: client.java

Okay so open client.java and search for sendMessage("Allstar-Scape");
Then you will get a bunch of things, here is the one for normal players.if (playerRights == 0) { sendMessage("Allstar-Scape"); sendMessage("Welcome to Allstar-Scape"); sendMessage("Info on becoming mod type ::modinfo"); sendMessage("Go to forums at allstarscapeforums.smfforfree2.com"); sendMessage("Type ::Starter To Begin"); sendMessage("Server Created By Mod Allstar"); newWelc(); }
You can change it to whatever you want.

if (playerRights == 0) { sendMessage("Welcome to Final Conquest"); sendMessage("Fourms soon!"); sendMessage("Type ::Starter To Begin"); sendMessage("Server Created By Dragon39990"); newWelc(); } If I changed it to that, when you logged in it would show this.

Read full topic
